Package sample.view_controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.view_controller.LoginController
  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class define the view and behaviors of the login.FXML and the users interactions with the login user interface.
    Author:
    Tchaikousky Thomas

        public LoginController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method sets the scene's fields before the scene is loaded. The labels are set based on the user's default locale.

      • handleLoginButton

        void handleLoginButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method determines what actions to take when the login button is pressed. All fields are checked to ensure that they are not null, then the values are checked at the database to ensure they match.
        Parameters:
        event - The action event
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • loginAttempts

        private void loginAttempts​(java.lang.String userName,
                           java.lang.String outcome)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method saves all attempted logins to a text file named login_activity.txt. The string typed into the userName TextField and a current timestamp is appended to the file.
        Parameters:
        userName - The string that was typed into the userName TextField.
        outcome - The string outcome of the attempted login. (Sucessful or Unsuccessful).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
